/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the towering buildings and the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene. The street is teeming with cars and pedestrians, adding a dynamic element to the image. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. In the distance, cranes can be seen, indicating ongoing construction and development. The image is bathed in the light of day, providing a vibrant and lively depiction of urban life in Beijing.
